reviews.sentence: Wonderful Staff and Great Hotel. we have been staying here for many years but stopped coming about 3 years ago as we became frustrated with having to pay for wifi. 10 per device was ridiculous. And as we sometimes stayed for 2 or 3 nights we had end up paying as much as 90 just for wifi. So as we found ourselves in town for a last minute business trip we decided to check the rates. Very pleased to find that wifi is now free and reasonably fast for our needs. Very much looking forward to a return visit. The hotel and staff have always been top notch. Great to see that that has not changed. we will be back soon. Thanks to the wonderful staff.

Passing through. A few years ago this was the only hotel we could find when the Interstate 5 was closed due to snow. They were very helpful and when we passed through this time I looked up this hotel. To my surprise their nightly rate was lower than I expected for the great quality of a hotel. Keep it up Hyat and I will always look to you first.

Very disappointed. There was a restaurant charge on my invoice for 1390 and I contacted the front desk to notify them that I did not eat at their restaurant charge a meal to my room or order room service so obviously someone used by credit card info on file to charge a meal. The person working the front desk was dismissive and rude and just said we will look it to it. I told him that was not good enough I wanted to know if my charge info and identity was compromised so I could notify my bank. I will cut to chase he was no help. I asked to speak to a manage but I was told there was not manager on duty so two hours later I finally spoke to a manager Jim who told me the charges would be reversed in 3 days. I still do not know if my personal info has been compromised and I have to monitor my account everyday and the charges have still not been reversed. Terrible customer service. Bob.
It was decent. Bathrobe. That they tried to charge for bottle of wine when we did not order it do not even drink at all.

great hotel great location. The hotel was clean personnel very attentive and the location was within walking distance to many restaurants and shopping areas. I was traveling alone and felt very safe. The fact that the restaurant bar was open until late was nice because I did not have to travel outside alone unles I wanted to. The parking was complimentary a real plus in California where I have typically found parking difficult to find or expensive.
Exceptional. The breakfast was absolutely amazing. The onsite restaurant is perfectdid not feel like to rate I paid was worth the room.

Hotel was OK. Room was nice clean and spacious. But there was only 1 electrical outlet. So charging more than 1 device at a time will be difficult. The only outlet was far away from the bed so if you want tocharge your phone on the night stand you are out of lck. Very nice neighborhood with nice shops.
Outstanding Restaurant though wine is very over priced.

Between 3 4 stars. We stayed in this area twice. The first time was at Fairfield Inn and the second time at Hyat Regency. I like the location at the Hyat Regeny. Walking distance to plenty of shops and restaurants a it felt like a safe area. We traveled with our dogs and they had a nice pet relief area. The hotel is older and I felt the price was maybe 30 higher than the value. the location maybe why. it is a small step up from the Fairfield Inn but not sure if it is worth the higher price for the extra amenities.

Good. Good location nice amenities. Very expensive for a property which did not have our rooms ready does not have a real bathroom fan and then gave my guests a bill even though I already paid with my credit card.

Worth the extra drive in LA. I have found myself spending more time on the freeway just to stay at this nice hotel for a good rate and in a nice area for dining. Nice staff and great location with golf course view. Highly recommend giving it a try if you find yourself in LA and want to get out of the city for a more relaxing business stay.

best location in Santa Clarita. All about location. Directly across from Valencia Town Center. Tons of shopping dining and walking options. So much better than hotels at Magic Mountain or Stevenson Ranch. Nice hotel. Quiet. Good garage although they charged for parking even though the website said they did not. Lobby currently under construction.

It was a good choice at a fairly reasonable rate. The hallways needed a good vacuuming and the common area needed a good dusting. It is very likely this was caused by the construction in the lobby. We did have a request that champagne and chocolate covered strawberries be delivered to our friends room who just got married that day. and that did n’t happen.

Terrible. My husband and I have stayed here several times over the last few years. Usually it has been a positive experience until our 1223 1226 stay for the holidays. We checked in at 9 pm on 1223. The following morning before 8 am someone tried to get into our room. I responded Um we are in here. It was awfully early and I looked out the peephole to see if it was housekeeping. All I caught was a woman with long hair in a pink sweater. The housekeeping cart was no where to be seen. This troubled my husband and I Did a stranger just try to get into our room. We called the front desk to ask about housekeeping and the front desk individual told us that housekeeping was not making the rounds at that time. We explained what happened and told her we wanted a new key and new room. We went to the front desk immediately. Once to the front desk it turned out that it had been the housekeeping supervisor and she thought our room was empty because there had been a glitch in our reservations so they did not have us checked in on 1223. We gave our card again for incidentals. Fast forward to our check out date on 1226 and in their system it said we were supposed to check out on 1227 and that they would charge us for early check out. Well our reservation was through Expedia from 1223 1226 and it was all paid for so. that did not make sense. Fast forward later in the day and I see a charge on my card from the Hyat. I called several times and each time front desk said they could not do anything they could not even tell me what the charge was for. They went onto say they would need to transfer me to accounting because someone was supposed to be there. Everytime they transferred me to accounting no one answered and I got voicemail. I left a message. A front desk person on 12 said she would walk back there and someone would call me. it is now 19 and no one has called me. So I contested the charge with my credit card company. This has been ridiculous. So you will charge me but you can not tell me why. I would NOT stay here again. Poor managing. Poor customer service. Time to fix your system.

Overall a great sleeping experience. The Restaurant needs some work. Just a run of the mill Eatery. Customer Service overall was spot on. The cleaning crew were very approachable the service oriented and kind when engaged in conversation. Overall great experience. Breakfast buffet was hilariously inadequate. for 21 it would be nice to have cottage cheese that was not cool instead of cold. If you plan on closing the buffet around 11 take the food away. At 105 I was recommended the buffet but there was simply burnt and overcooked items left over and a very small amount. I was told they would not be adding more food. But then 3 more groups showed up and were told the buffet was still open. Very poorly run in that regard. Overall the restaurant was a run of the mill hotel eatery. Average low quality food and menu with a high quality price.

Good location nice hotel but pay attention to details. Parking is free in a parking garage. A band just finished playing in the lobby when we arrived around 10 pm. Bed was comfortable but the room was not very clean and the toilet was clogged. The switches had dirt smudges on them. The touchscreen on the thermostat was dirty with white crusty stuff on it. People were loud in the hall for about 20 min after we got there.
Good for the price. For the price and location this is not a bad hotel. Definitely could stand to be updated in the rooms especially since they have done the lobby restaurant recently.

Parking Fees and No Complementary Anything. Beautiful interior and well kept. Staff wonderful and prompt. Building design inconvenient due limited entrances one way in and limited parking. Parking allowed you must pay for and valet owns first floor so must trek a ways to reach vehicle challenging when you have multiple bags and items to bring back and forth especially if you have children or pets. All complementary items you must pay for. Water 5. Full restaurant on first floor but must pay full price. Doorman available but limited. Not easy to find baggage cart. Location is congested.
Nice hotel in a very nice area and the price was reasonable. I would have thought the pool area would be a little bigger.

Good location Friendly staff. If the rule in Real estate is location location location this hotel has a lot going for it. Besides being in proximity to family venues like Six Flags Magic Mountain it is also a short walk to the Westfield Valencia Mall a movie theatre and some pretty nice eatery choices like Lazy Dog BJs and an excellent Juice Stop for high quality smoothies. The hotel itself has a very friendly staff pleasantly spacious and clean rooms and fulfilled one of my rare requests of other higher end hotels to provide bath towels that are plush and absorbent rather than the seen better days thin ones most hotels offer. We also appreciated a container of Q tips also a rare hotel offering. Beds and pillows are comfortable and the housekeeping staff very accommodating for requests. There is a refrigerator in the rooms but no coffee or microwave for in room tea water although there is a note in the room that some convenience items can be requested from hair brushes to coffee. Our 5th floor room was quiet even overlooking the pool and jacuzi area. The value is comparable to other hotels of its caliber and they offer extended stay rate negotiation.

Lovely and comfortable. I Used this hotel for a business stay. it ’s in a great location very comfortable and it met all my needs. It has a selection of good restaurants surrounding it and offers free parking. The breakfast is great pricey but the food beverage chips bring it back to a reasonable cost.
